code:
---
title: profile package
config:
  htmlLabels: false
umlink:
  select:
    - field: package
      pattern: com.rocket.radar.profile
---

classDiagram
direction LR

%% =========================
%% MODEL — User Profile
%% =========================

class ProfileModel {
    - String uid
    - String name
    - String phoneNumber
    - String email
    - Timestamp lastLogin
    - Boolean notificationsEnabled
    - Boolean geolocationEnabled
    - ArrayList<String> onWaitlistEventIds
    - ArrayList<String> onMyEventIds
    - ArrayList<String> onInvitedEventIds
    - ArrayList<String> attendingEventIds
    - ArrayList<String> cancelledEventIds
    - String role
    - GeoPoint lastKnownLocation

    + getUid() : String
    + setUid(String)
    + getName() : String
    + setName(String)
    + getEmail() : String
    + setEmail(String)
    + getPhoneNumber() : String
    + setPhoneNumber(String)
    + getRole() : UserRole
    + setRole(UserRole)
    + isNotificationsEnabled() : Boolean
    + setNotificationsEnabled(Boolean)
    + isGeolocationEnabled() : Boolean
    + setGeolocationEnabled(Boolean)
    + getOnWaitlistEventIds() : ArrayList<String>
    + addOnWaitlistEventId(String)
    + removeOnWaitlistEventId(String)
    + getOnMyEventIds() : ArrayList<String>
    + addOnMyEventId(String)
    + removeOnMyEventId(String)
    + getOnInvitedEventIds() : ArrayList<String>
    + addOnInvitedEventId(String)
    + removeInvitedEventId(String)
    + getAttendingEventIds() : ArrayList<String>
    + addAttendingEventId(String)
    + getCancelledEventIds() : ArrayList<String>
    + addCancelledEventId(String)
}

class UserRole {
    <<enum>>
    ENTRANT
    ORGANIZER
    ADMIN
}

%% =========================
%% VALIDATION UTILITY
%% =========================

class InputValidator {
    <<utility>>
    + isValidEmail(String) : boolean
    + isValidPhone(String) : boolean
    + cleanText(TextInputEditText) : String
}

%% =========================
%% REPOSITORY
%% =========================

class ProfileRepository {
    - FirebaseFirestore db

    + readProfile(String, ReadCallback)
    + writeProfile(ProfileModel, WriteCallback)
    + deleteAccount(FirebaseUser, ProfileModel, WriteCallback)
    + addEventIdToWaitlist(String,String,WriteCallback)
    + addEventIdToMyEvent(String,String,WriteCallback)
    + updateLastLogin(String)
    + updateUserProfileLocation(String,GeoPoint)
    + updateUserInvitedList(String,String)
}

class ReadCallback {
    <<interface>>
    + onProfileLoaded(ProfileModel)
    + onError(Exception)
}

class WriteCallback {
    <<interface>>
    + onSuccess()
    + onError(Exception)
}

ProfileRepository "1" ..> "*" ProfileModel : creates/manages
ProfileRepository "1" *-- "2" ProfileRepository_ReadCallback : defines
ProfileRepository "1" *-- "2" ProfileRepository_WriteCallback : defines

%% =========================
%% VIEWMODEL
%% =========================

class ProfileViewModel {
    - FirebaseFirestore db
    - FirebaseAuth auth
    - ProfileRepository profileRepository
    - ListenerRegistration profileListenerRegistration
    - MutableLiveData<ProfileModel> profileLiveData
    - MutableLiveData<Boolean> deleteSuccess

    + getProfileLiveData() : LiveData<ProfileModel>
    + getDeleteSuccess() : LiveData<Boolean>
    + setUserIdForProfileListener(String)
    + deleteProfile(ProfileModel)
    + updateProfile(ProfileModel)
    + getProfile(String)
    + updateLastLogin(String)
}
ProfileViewModel "1" --> "1" ProfileRepository : uses
ProfileViewModel "1" *-- "0..1" ProfileModel : observes/manages as live data

%% =========================
%% ACCOUNT SETTINGS UI
%% =========================

class AccountSettingsFragment {
    - MaterialButton backButton
    - MaterialButton saveButton
    - MaterialButton deleteButton
    - MaterialButton adminButton
    - TextInputEditText usernameField
    - TextInputEditText emailField
    - TextInputEditText phoneNumberField
    - MaterialSwitch notificationsEnabled
    - MaterialSwitch geolocationEnabled
    - ProfileViewModel profileViewModel
    - AdminModeManager adminModeManager
    - String uid

    + onCreateView()
    + confirmAccountDelete()
}


AccountSettingsFragment "1" *-- "1" ProfileViewModel : uses
AccountSettingsFragment "1" ..> "1" InputValidator : validates with
AccountSettingsFragment "1" --> "1" AdminModeManager : toggles admin mode

%% =========================
%% PROFILE UI
%% =========================

class ProfileFragment {
    - ImageButton accountSettingsButton
    - MaterialButton criteriaButton
    - TextView profileName
    - ProfileViewModel profileViewModel
    - ProfileModel currentUserProfile
    - RecyclerView myEventRecyclerView
    - EventAdapter adapter
    - EventHistoryAdapter historyAdapter
    - MaterialButtonToggleGroup toggleGroup
    - List<Event> allEvents
    - List<Event> displayedEvents
    - EventRepository eventRepository

    + onCreateView()
    + onViewCreated()
    - setupToggleListener()
    - observeUserProfile()
    - observeEvents()
    - filterAndDisplayEvents()
    + onEventClick(int,View)
    + onResume()
}

ProfileFragment "1" *-- "1" ProfileViewModel : observes
ProfileFragment "1" *-- "0..1" ProfileModel : displays
ProfileFragment "1" --> "1" EventRepository : fetches events
ProfileFragment "1" --> "1" EventAdapter : displays events
ProfileFragment "1" --> "1" EventHistoryAdapter : displays history

ProfileRepository "1" --> "1" FirebaseFirestore : reads/writes
ProfileViewModel "1" --> "1" ProfileRepository : business logic
